m_szDocTitle: Volkswagen Plug-In SUV Video Teaser (Vaporware, Beware) | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Volkswagen Plug-In SUV Video Teaser (Vaporware, Beware) Originally published on EV Obsession . Despite all of its ongoing legal and PR issues (following the diesel emissions cheating scandal), it seems that Volkswagen is still chugging along just fine …. The company recently released a number of new teaser images of the luxury plug-in hybrid SUV concept that it will be revealing at the upcoming Beijing Auto Show — giving us a first look of sorts at the concept car. The new plug-in hybrid electric (PHEV) SUV concept has been described by the company as being indicative of its future direction —
